data.name: Sky Climb
data.description:
Introducing Sky Climb, the ultimate virtual reality platform game! Get ready to embark on an exhilarating journey through the skies of various captivating worlds, all while defying gravity and confronting daring challenges. As the hero of a fantastical balloon universe, your mission is to restore harmony by rescuing guardians from the clutches of corruption across seven distinct realms.

Sky Climb offers a thrilling MULTIPLAYER mode where you can test your skills against five other players in an action-packed championship. But the excitement doesn't end there! With our innovative BUILDER MODE, you can unleash your creativity and design your very own levels. Dive into a world of endless challenges and share your creations with fellow players, putting your platforming skills to the test.

Key Features:

- 65 exhilarating single-player levels featuring seven challenging bosses and a variety of power-ups.
- Experience an innovative locomotion system that fully immerses you, utilizing your hands and arms for an unparalleled gaming experience.
- Customize your hero with a ton of unique combinations, ensuring your character stands out in the crowd.
- Compete for the title of the fastest player on the leaderboards for each level.
- Level Editor available in Mixed Reality

Sky Climb is the game that will take your Virtual Reality gaming experience to new heights. Get ready to soar through the skies and embrace the thrill of platforming like never before!
